name: Atlético de Madrid Flip
description:
Atlético de Madrid Flip, one of the BEST football strategy games for FREE in the world. It’s really ADDICTIVE and you can play it now for FREE! Since it's an Official Atlético de Madrid game, you can choose your favorite team managing their stars like Godín, Juanfran, Filipe Luis, Carrasco, etc. DOWNLOAD IT NOW FOR FREE!

Get your team ready for action and enjoy football like never before! The gameplay is very different from the other games in the sports category as it’s a very unique trading card game. It’s easy to play but hard to perfect. Let's get this show on the road!

GAME STRATEGY
In Atlético de Madrid Flip, each card has its own set of skill points - for offense and defense. You must decide how to use them in each moment in order to win the throw-down and come out with the big win. You’ll be the king of football.

CREATE A WELL-ROUNDED LINEUP
Create a powerful lineup, throw down your best cards and flip those of your opponents. The more flips you can make, the higher the chances you have of winning. In addition, you’ll have to even out your roster in order to play with a balanced lineup. That way you’ll have a higher chance of using your best cards in each game.

COLLECT 300 PLAYERS
If you can use your top skills, you’ll win a lot of games and, the more you win, the more packs you can get. Eventually you’ll be able to collect the best players like Koke, Griezmann, Gameiro, etc., as well as 300 other footballer superstars.

MULTIPLAYER - 1 ON 1 and TOURNAMENTS
Play live games against thousands of users in League or Tournament mode, all or nothing, and prove you have what it takes to lead the best team.
